item.title: 335: Dateline's The Sting | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description FAM! THIS IS OUR MOST REQUESTED "DATELINE" YET! Newlywed Dalia Dippolito returned home from the gym to the awful news that her husband had been killed. In a case where almost nothing was as it seemed, investigators wanted to know: Was Dalia diabolical or an unwitting pawn in a hoax gone wrong? LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 400 FULL AD-FREE BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW!

item.title: 334: Murder At Carter County Mines | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In January 2004, Cheryl and Gary young, a popular couple in their small Kentucky town, vanished. In their home, police discover a bloody crime scene, but no clues as to who did this or what became of Cheryl and Gary. When checks and credit card purchases are detected in Gary's name in another state a few days later, police must determine if Gary was murderer now living on the lam or if someone else had assumed his identity.

item.title: 333: Dateline's "Tangled" | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description It's one of our most requested Datelines yet! After a sudden marriage creates tension between two families, a murder exposes secrets, lies and a long-buried mystery. Come to Patrick's Traveling book party! He'll bein in Pittsburgh This Friday and Saturday evening and then in Toronto on Sunday! Get info and ticket here! LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 400 FULL AD-FREE BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW!

item.title: 332: The Murder of Nikki Kuhnhausen (From Hulu's "How I Caught My Killer) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description 17 year old Nikki Kuhnhausen was a social media star. She lived her life online. So when she suddenly stopped posting in June of 2019, instantly her friends, family, and followers knew something was wrong. Investigators quickly jump in and use Nikki's own social media accounts to try to figure out what happened to her. Come to Patrick's Traveling book party! He'll bein in Pittsburgh This Friday and Saturday evening and then in Toronto on Sunday!

item.title: 331: Dateline's "Murder in Mustang" | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Firefighter Keith Bryan and his wife Becky have recently reconciled after a brief split in their marriage. Everything seemed to be going great. But then, there's a frantic 911 call. It's Becky. Her husband has just been shot at point blank range by an intruder in their home. He didn't harm Becky, but he did deliver a mysterious message. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 400 FULL AD-FREE BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW!

item.title: 330: The Case of the Poisoned Cheesecake (Maybe our most outrageous episode ever?) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description This. One. Is. Wild. In August 2016, a beauty stylist in Queens, NY became deathly ill after a client--Who insisted on an "Emergency Eyelash Extension"--gave her a slice of cheesecake. The client, a mysterious woman named Viktoria Nasyrova, quickly vanished. And when the manhunt for her begins, authorities quickly discover that this woman will stop at nothing to get what she wants. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 400 FULL AD-FREE BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW!

item.title: 329: Dateline's "Queen of the County" | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description A matriarch's death leads to a prominent family from Texas being torn apart by decades of betrayal, greed and mistrust. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 400 FULL AD-FREE BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW! Including our episode-by-episode coverage of "House of Haammer" "Trainwreck: Woodstock '99," "Bad Vegan" "LuLaRich" "John Wayne Gacy: Devil in Disguise" "Night Stalker" "The Jinx," "Making A Murderer," "The Staircase,"

item.title: 328: Catching The Craigslist Killer | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In April 2009, the city of Boston was on high alert--there was a madman on the loose. They called him the Craigslist killer since his MO was to meet young women on craigslist.com, meet them, and then rob them. And he would kill if they fought back. All police had to go on were grainy photos from hotel security cameras. But as the attacks continued, the search for the killer escalated and they knew it was just a matter of time before he struck again.

item.title: 327: Dateline's The Mystery at Empire Lake | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Michelle Harris, a mother of four, disappears, vanishing in the night. The next morning, her car is found at the foot of the driveway, but nothing else: no body, no weapon. What could have happened? A trial reveals an ugly secret lurking at home. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 400 FULL AD-FREE BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW! Including our episode-by-episode coverage of "

item.title: 326: The Murder of LaJoya McCoy (From Dateline's The Dead of Night) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In June 2015, LaJoya McCoy's life is on the upswing: a good job, exciting business ventures, and a new love prospect. But all of a sudden, LaJoya vanishes into the thin air, taking with her a secret that's about to unravel. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 400 FULL AD-FREE BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW! Including our episode-by-episode coverage of "House of Haammer"

item.title: 325: Dateline's The Favorite Son (The murders of Joe and Olga Connell) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In the early morning hours of September 22, 2013, residents of Paladin Club Apartments in Wilmington, Delaware were awoken by shouting and a shower of more than 20 gunshots that quickly followed. Outside the building, a young couple, Joseph and Olga Connell had just returned from celebrating Olga’s birthday. And now they were both dead. Nothing was taken, they still had their wallet, purse, phones, and a diamond ring on Olga’s finger.

item.title: 324: The Piketon Family Murders | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description We have never covered a case as gruesome as this. Eight murders in 4 separate crime scenes. All at the same time. All members of the same small town family. There's no obvious motive, no clues, no suspects. So what the hell happened on April 21, 2016 in Pike county, Ohio when an entire family who had lived there for generations were all killed for no apparent reason? LOOKING FOR MORE TCO?

item.title: 323: The Murder of Paula Sladewski (Dateline's "The Death of A Golden Girl") | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Grainy surveillance video captured the last known images of 26 year old Paula Sladewski leaving a Miami night club on the morning of January 3, 2010. Hours later, her body would be found in a nearby dumpster. She had been strangled and set on fire. Who had done these horrible things to this former Playboy video model and why? Her boyfriend, family, and friends quickly embarked on a journey to find out the truth.

item.title: 322: Death By Fame: The Murder of Amie Harwick | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On the morning of February 15, 2020, 38-year-old Amie Harwick was found unresponsive outside the Los Angeles apartment building where she lived. She'd endured a brutal attack and was then thrown from the balcony of her apartment on the third floor. She died from her injuries shortly thereafter. Quickly, the hunt was on for to learn who had done this to her and why. Amie was a clinical psychologist who was also a mainstay of the LA party scene.

item.title: 321: Evil Was Waiting: The Murder of Vincent Goslyn (From Dateline) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On the evening of February 3, 2012, 28-year-old Vincent Goslyn Jr and his wife Jessie were on their way home from dinner when they pulled over to help a stranded driver on the side of the road. Minutes later, Jessie would call 911 and report that the man they just tired to help had shot and killed her husband and she had sped off in their car, fearing for her life.

item.title: 320: The Murder of John Lennon (From Max's "Crimes Of The Century") | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description December 8, 1980. 10:50 pm. John Lennon--the former Beatle and music industry icon--returned to his Manhattan apartment building with his wife, Yoko Ono after a long evening of recording down town. As Lennon walked toward his building, a young man approached him from behind. Lennon had met this man just a few hours before--he'd signed an autograph for him while another man took a picture. This time, the young man had a gun.

item.title: 319: SURPRISE! THE OBSESSED FEST AUCTION IS NOW LIVE! BID ON AMAZING PRIZES! | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Hey Fam! We are OVER THE MOON to tell you that the Obsessed Fest auction is now live! That's right, this year we're raising money for two amazing local Texas organizations: Fund Texas Choice and The Transgender Education Network of Texas. AND YOU CAN HELP BY BIDDING ON THESE AMAZING AUCTION ITEMS! We're talking zoom hangs with your favorite podcasters, personalized ring tones, A private book reading with Patrick, swag packs, signed memorabilia, guest spots on podcasts, memberships to various Patreons and so much more!

item.title: 318: The Murder of Marie Singleton (Dateline's "Missing Marie") | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On November 16, 1994, the body of 33-year-old Marie Singleton was found in the trunk of her car near a beach in Los Angeles, California. The young mother had been missing for five days. Singleton was loved by her family and friends, but she also had a secret: while almost everyone she knew thought she worked for the department of defense, she actually worked for the CIA. Did this have something to do with her brutal murder?

item.title: 317: Matthew Shepard: An American Hate Crime | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On the evening of October 6, 1998, 21-year-old Matthew Shepard was kidnapped by two young men. He was taken to a remote Wyoming prairie where he was tied to a fence, beaten unconscious, and left to die. 25 years later, this new documentary reexamines the crime, the nation's response to it, and what--if anything--we have learned. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 300 FULL BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW!

item.title: 316: The Dexter Killer (from 48 hours) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description By the fall of 2008, Mark Twitchell could no longer control his dark urges. And so the 29-year-old filmmaker, husband, and father began luring unsuspecting victims to a rented garage in a quiet neighborhood. Believing they were going there to meet Tinder dates, these victims were quickly overtaken by a gun-wheedling monster in a hockey mask whose only plan was to torture and kill them in the style of Dexter Morgan--his favorite character on his favorite TV show.

item.title: 315: Malfunction: The Dressing Down of Janet Jackson | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description It's one of the most memorable moments in television history, but nobody really knows what actually happened or why. At the Superbowl halftime show in 2004, two of the world's biggest stars shared the stage: Janet Jackson and Justin Timberlake. At the end of their number, Timberlake ripped away a piece of Jackson's top, exposing her breast to 9/16ths of a second. The incident caused an international scandal, and Jackson's career would never be the same.

item.title: 314: Death In The Dorms: The Murder of Andrea DelVesco | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On a September morning in 2015, students at UCLA woke up to a dark smoky cloud over Westwood, as fire consumes an apartment building full of sorority sisters. When Andrea DelVesco’s body is found in the ashes, the police uncover the shocking truth behind a web of lies in their desperate quest to catch a killer. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 300 FULL BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW!

item.title: 313: Slayed in Soho: The Murder of Theresa Cha (From New York Homicide) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description When Theresa Cha, an aspiring writer and painter in the vibrant Soho art scene of the early '80s, is found murdered just two days after her debut book is published, her devastated husband becomes the prime suspect. But was he the killer? And if not him, then who? And why? With little to go on, investigators begin a dogged search for a murderer, hoping to catch him before he kills again.

item.title: 312: The Murder of Brittanee Drexel (Dateline's "The Last Walk) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description It was a mystery that took 12 years to solve. In April 2009, 17-year-old Brittanee Drexel headed to Myrtle Beach with a group of older friends for spring break. The trip wasn't going well--she wasn't getting along with the people she was traveling with, so she spent much of the first day texting her boyfriend back home. But when the text messages suddenly stopped, the boyfriend panicked. You see, nobody knew Brittanee had made this trip--her parents had forbidden it.

item.title: 311: Truth And Lies: Waco | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description David Koresh said he was the Messiah. .His followers believed. They were willing to die for him. So when the government guns and tanks rolled in to liberate his cult, his people believed The Apocalypse was here and it was time kill or be killed. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 300 FULL BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW! Including our episode-by-episode coverage of "

item.title: Who Killed Robert Wone | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Four men in a house. One of them is them is murdered. Who is the killer? 32-year-old Robert Wone is stabbed 3 times in the middle of the night while spending the night at the home of his best friend, Joe Price, at Joe's townhouse in Washington DC. Joe, and his partners Victor and Dylan--who also live at the house--insist that there was an intruder. But the men are also acting.

item.title: 310: Sherri Papini: Lies Lies and More Lies | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On November 2, 2016, 34-year-old Sherri Papini vanished while out for a jog. Three weeks later, she reappeared on the side of the highway in the middle of the night. Beaten and bruised, she told a horrific story of being kidnapped and tortured. It was the stuff of nightmares. The only thing is that none of it was true. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 300 FULL BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW!

item.title: Our Interview With Terra Newell from "Dirty John" | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Terra Newell may be best known for taking down "Dirty John" Mehan when he attacked her in a parking garage in 2016, but she is so SO much more that that. In the years since that incident, Terra has used her experience to help other people tell their stories. In this interview, Terra shares her experience knowing John, what it took to survive him, and how she has found power in telling her story.

item.title: Dirty John: The Dirty Truth | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description When Debra Newell met John Meehan on dating site for the 50+ crowd, he seemed too good to be true. A handsome, fit, successful doctor? She was interested. But, beginning with their first date, there were warning signs...something wasn't quite right here. But she ignored her instincts and allowed him to move quickly. He moved in with her after a few weeks and convinced her to marry him after just two months.

item.title: 309: Who Killed Angie Dodge: Keith Morrison Investigates | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On June 13, 1996, 18-year-old Angie Dodge was found brutally murdered in her home. Quickly, her good friend, 20-year-old Chris Tapp is convicted and sentenced to life in prison. But Angie's mother is convinced Chris is innocent (and she's right!) and she sets out on a mission to exonerate Chris and hunt down the real killer. FAM!! WE'RE ON TOUR!! Come see us COVER "THE JINX" LIVE in Boston, Washington DC, Charlotte, Denver, Chicago, Seattle, Los Angeles, and NEW Y0RK CITY!

item.title: 308: The Disappearance of Maya Millete | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description 30 year old wife and mother of three, Maya Millete, was last seen on January 7, 2021. In the weeks before, her marriage had been falling apart. And on the day she vanished, she had called a divorce attorney. The next morning, January 8, Maya's husband, Larry, is seen on surveillance video backing his SUV into the garage--which is attached to the house--before driving off and being gone for 11 hours.

item.title: 307: Money Shot: The PornHub Story | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Pornhub is the tenth most visited website in the world. But you probably would have guessed that. But what you might not have guessed is that there's a dark secret that powers the website that they don't want you to know. This documentary takes you behind the scenes and into the anonymous online world of online sex. FAM!! WE'RE ON TOUR!! Come see us COVER "THE JINX" LIVE in Boston, Washington DC, Charlotte, Denver, Chicago, Seattle, Los Angeles, and NEW Y0RK CITY!

item.title: 306: Tragic Beauty: The Death (or murder?) Of Anna Nicole Smith | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Anna Nicole Smith was an icon--a bombshell--whose rise to international superstardom was as fast an unexpected as her tragic and untimely death. The world thought they knew her--a "dumb blonde" gold digger who would have done anything to become rich and famous. But now, for the first time, we get to know the real woman: the mother, the hard worker, the survivor the world refused to see. And we're left with the burning question--was this tragic beauty murdered by the people she trusted the most?

item.title: Wild Crime: The Mysterious Death (Or Murder?) Of Toni | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Mid-afternoon on September 29, 2012, 56-year-old Harold Henthorn made a terrifying call to 911. He was in the middle of the Rocky Mountain National Forrest with his wife Toni...and she had just taken a brutal fall off a very high cliff. It was a tragic accident, he told the dispatcher, and his wife now lay on the forest floor in critical condition. Toni would not survive the fall, and as investigators took a closer look at Harold and Toni's marriage, it became clear that she had not been happy and that, perhaps, this had not been a fall after all.

item.title: An Interview With Collier Landry of "A Murder In Mansfield" | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description FAM!! I am so excited that I got a chance to sit down with our friend, Collier Landry, to get the full story on the making of his documentary "A Murder In Mansfield." As you know, the documentary tells the story of Collier's father murdering his mother and how Collier helped unravel the case and secure his father's conviction. In this interview we get all the details left out of the film and we talk about all the hot button issues that stood out to us.

item.title: 305: A Murder In Mansfield | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On December 31, 1989, 11 year old Collier Landry woke up to the sound of his father murdering his mother, Noreen. When she was nowhere to be found the next day, it seemed like nobody believed Collier and the police treated the situation like a missing person's case. But less than a month later, Noreen's body is found buried in the basement his father's new home. So now what?

item.title: 304: Amber: The Girl Behind The Alert | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description You've heard of the Amber Alert, but have you heard of Amber Hagerman? Hagerman was the 9-year-old girl who's abduction and murder was the impetus for the alert system that has now saved the lives of over1000 children. In this documentary--one of the best we've seen in a while--Amber's mother shares the chilling and downright shocking details of her daughter's murder for the first and last time. And she shares the never before seen documentary footage that captured Amber's last days.

item.title: 303: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In October 2001, dismembered body parts began washing ashore on a beach in Galveston, Texas. Shortly thereafter, Manhattan Real Estate Millionaire-AND SUPREME WEIRDO--Robert Durst was arrested for the murder and dismemberment. Though he would eventually BE ACQUITTED EVEN THOUGH HE DEFINITELY DID IT, suddenly authorities became interested in Durst for two other murders--the murder of his wife and the murder of his best friend. SPOILER....HE, LIKE, "KILLED THEM ALL, OF COURSE.

item.title: 302: The Hatchet Wielding Hitchhiker | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description It's the story of how one young guy went from overnight internet celebrity to brutal murderer in just three months. In 2013, a young man named Kai became an internet sensation when--wielding a hatchet--he saved a woman from the grips of a deranged motorist. He gave one interview to a local TV station and then suddenly everyone from Jimmy Kimmel to the Kardashians to hundreds of millions of internet users became obsessed with him.

item.title: 301: Kidnapped At Birth: The Carlina White Story (From Beyond The Headlines) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Carlina White was just 19 days on on August 4, 1987 when she was kidnapped from the Harlem hospital where her loving parents had taken her in order to treat a high fever. The woman who kidnapped Carlina raised her as her own daughter in Bridgeport, Connecticut where Carlina had a good life--surrounded by loving cousins, grandparents, and other extended family. It wouldn't be until 2005, when a pregnant Carlina was applying for pre-natal care, that the truth would come to light and turn her world upside down.

item.title: 300: Mass Murderer or Misconception: Who Was Patient Zero? | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description For decades, one man has been blamed for bringing AIDS to the United States and knowingly spreading is from coast to coast. He's known as Patient Zero. He's been vilified as a narcissistic, sex crazed, maniac without whom AIDS might not have become a worldwide pandemic. But how much of that is true? FAM!! WE'RE GOING ON TOUR!! Come see us COVER "THE JINX" LIVE in Boston, Washington DC, Charlotte, Denver, Chicago, Seattle, Los Angeles, and NEW Y0RK CITY!

item.title: 299: The Final Days of Whitney Houston | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description At 3:30 pm On February 11, 2012, 46 year old Whitney Houston--the singing legend and icon--was found unconscious and unresponsive in the bathtub of her room at the Beverly Hills Hotel. She was pronounced dead within the hour. According to police, "there were no obvious sings of criminal intent" but still, rumors and conspiracy theories have swirled around Houston's death since the moment it happened. So what really happened to Whitney Houston and how did a legend who seemed to be on top of the world end up leaving us so young?

item.title: 298: The Pez Outlaw | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description What must it be like to have a dream and to bring that dream to life through grit and the sheer force of will? The Pez outlaw certainly knows. Steve Glew, said outlaw, dreamt of leaving his boring, dreary life behind for the wild adventure of bringing the world's most interesting Pez dispensers to the US. And he did it. And he made a FORTUNE. Until it was all taken away.

item.title: 297: The Disappearance of the Milbrook Twins | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Danette and Jeanette Milbrook, 15-year-old twins, vanished off the street of Augusta, Georgia on March 18, 1990. It's one of the only cases of missing twins in American history, but their case was scarcely investigated and most people have never heard of them. Now, a new investigation sheds new light on the case and we may finally know what happened. FAM!! WE'RE GOING ON TOUR!! Come see us COVER "

item.title: 296: I Love You, You Hate Me | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In 1988, a suburban mom named Sheryl Leach created Barney the Dinosaur as a simple, loving character that she thought her son would love. Within a few years Barney was everywhere. The character and TV show was a billion dollar business and cultural phenomenon. But fame and fortune can lead to disaster, as it did for Leach's family and for the friendly lovable Dinosaur that was an unstoppable force.

item.title: 295: The Hillside Strangler(s) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In just over a year, 10 women and girls were found murdered on the hillsides of Los Angles County. There were precious few clues, and, terrifyingly, no pattern. Anyone could be a target. No one was safe. Who was this killer--or killers? And could he ever be stopped? FAM!! WE'RE GOING ON TOUR!! Come see us COVER "THE JINX" LIVE in Boston, Washington DC, Charlotte, Denver, Chicago, Seattle, Los Angeles, and NEW Y0RK CITY!

item.title: 294: God Forbid: The Pool Boy Sex Scandal That Brought Down A Dynasty | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description A Miami pool boy finds himself trapped in a seven-year affair with a charming older woman and her husband, the Evangelical Trump stalwart Jerry Falwell Jr. As he becomes increasingly entangled with the Falwell’s seemingly perfect lives, he quickly realizes that this affair could cost him everything--including his life. FAM!! WE'RE GOING ON TOUR!! Come see us COVER "THE JINX" LIVE in Boston, Washington DC, Charlotte, Denver, Chicago, Seattle, Los Angeles, and NEW Y0RK CITY!

item.title: 293: Killing Patrick Duffey (...And The Bugs Bunny Defense) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On a cool night in Los Angeles in 2007, Linda Duffey shot her husband Patrick in the head while he lay comfortably on the couch. She would say it was a terrible accident. And at first investigators believed her. But as her story became more bizarre--involving Bugs Bunny and Elmer Fudd, authorities became less certain she was telling the truth. So what really happened? Was this an accident? Or murder.

item.title: 292: Capturing The Killer Nurse | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Charles "Charlie" Cullen, aka "The Killer Nurse" is suspected of killing over 400 unsuspecting patients at various hospitals where he worked over his 30 year nursing career. This makes him the most prolific serial killer in WORLD HISTORY. He did his killing in secret, of course, and was well loved by hospital colleagues. But looking back, the evidence of murders was plain for anyone to see. And hospital administrators, who had to be aware of what he was doing, turned a blind eye to protect their business rather than protecting their patients.

item.title: The Abduction and Murder of Kristin Smart | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On May 25, 1996, 19-year-old college student Kristin Smart went to an off-campus party. Around 2 am, she was last seen being helped back to her dorm by another student named Paul Flores. No one ever saw Kristin again. It would take over 25 years to unravel the mystery of that night and to be able to prove what happened to Kristin Smart. FAM!! WE'RE GOING ON TOUR!! Come see us COVER "

item.title: 291: The Boston Strangler | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In the early 60s, a madman was on the loose in Boston. In the span of 2 years, he's know to have brutally raped and murdered at least 13 women in their own homes. The killer was a monster who definitely didn't look like one--he'd easily gain his victim's trust and access to their homes, as there was never any sign of forced entry. And he was meticulous, almost never leaving a single clue.

item.title: MAJOR ANNOUNCEMENT!!! | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description FAM!!! WE'RE GOING ON TOUR!! WE'RE HITTING THE ROAD THIS SPRING AND SUMMER AND WE'RE COMING TO A CITY NEAR YOU! ANNNNNNN!!! WE'RE COVERING "THE JINX." If you've seen us live before, you know you don't want to miss this, and if you've never seen us live, NOW IS THE TIME TO GET THAT CORRECTED!! Click on the city below to find tickets! item.title: 290: Catching A Serial Killer: Bruce McArthur | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Bruce McArthur was many things: friend, grandfather, Mall Santa, landscaper, and RUTHLESS SERIAL KILLER who buried body parts in the yards of his posh clientele. This is the true story of the race to catch Toronto's most prolific serial killer. FAM!! WE'RE GOING ON TOUR!! Come see us COVER "THE JINX" LIVE in Boston, Washington DC, Charlotte, Denver, Chicago, Seattle, Los Angeles, and NEW Y0RK CITY! Get information and tickets right by clicking here!

item.title: The Murdaugh Murders (Dateline) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On the evening of June 7, 2021, Alex Murdaugh, a member of one of the most powerful families in South Carolina, came home to a brutal scene: The bodies of his 21 year old son, Paul, and 52 year old wife, Maggie. Both of whom had been shot multiple times. Could this be connected to the death of Paul's friend Mallory, who had been thrown from a boat Paul had been driving while drunk?

item.title: 289: Killings In A College Town: The University of Idaho Murders (From Dateline) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On the morning of November 13, 2022, students at the University of Idaho woke up to horrifying news: four students had been brutally, viciously murdered in a home they shared just six blocks from campus. Madison Mogen, Kaylee Goncalves, Ethan Chapin, and Xana Kernodle were all gone. Miraculously, two roommates survived, but they weren't talking. The police also weren't saying much. So what happened? Who killed these popular students?

item.title: "Crimes of the Centuries" Returns for Season 3! | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Hey, Fam!! We're so thrilled that Crimes of the Centuries from the Obsessed Network is back for Season 3! Join host Amber Hunt each week as she dives deep into a case that was huge when it happened but somehow got lost to time. These cases may not be remembered, but their impact on society lives on. Today we're sharing the first part of the Season 3 premiere, featuring the story of the Victorian Era's forgotten serial killer, Dr.

item.title: House of Hammer | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Remember back in 2021 when it was revealed that Armie Hammer--that guy from the Facebook movie and "Call Me By Your Name"--had been abusing women for years, cheating on his wife, and, oh, was maybe a cannibal? That's what this one is all about. We're thrilled to share this episode ad-free. You can hear our coverage of the rest of this series right now on our Patreon. On Patreon, you'll also find over 350 full ad-free episodes to download and binge the second you sign up!

item.title: 288: Web of Death: The Murder of Elnora Griffin | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On the evening of July 23, 1993, Elnora Griffin was murdered in her home in Tyler, Texas. The crime was so brutal, some first responders, for their own good, were actually kept from entering the crime scene. Quickly, Elnora's neighbor, 25 year old Ed Ates was the prime suspect. He lived next door to Elnora and witness claimed that Ed was at Elnora's house just before the murder happened.

item.title: 287: The Crime Against Pam and Tommy: Rich and Shameless | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Pamela Anderson and Tommy Lee were two of the most famous people in the world in 1995. That year, a contractor who had been fired from job on their home, broke in and stole a safe. The safe contained a sex tape Pam and Tommy made on their honeymoon. Now for the first time, hear the story of how the tape stolen, how it changed our culture, and nearly ruined the lives of the two people who made it.

item.title: 286: Who Killed Jam Master Jay? | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description As the DJ behind the iconic group RUN DMC, Jam Master Jay was a genius, a trailblazer, and for the people of Hollis, Queens, a hometown hero who never forgot where he came from. So how is it possible that when he was gunned down in his own recording studio--with four witnesses present--nobody saw a thing and, more than twenty years later, his murder is still unsolved. The answer is less complicated than you'd think.

item.title: 285: The Real Bling Ring: Part 2 | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Listen, in part 2, celebrities like Orlando Bloom are here to kick some freaking ass...so that's awesome. Not to blame the victims here, but WHY DON'T CELEBRITIES LOCK THEIR DOORS? Anyway, meet Nick and Rachel, two bored, celebrity obsessed, high schoolers who decide it would be cool to break into the homes of celebrities like Paris Hilton, ORLANDO BLOOM, and Rachel Bilsion TO GO SHOPPING IN THEIR CLOSETS. They become self described "

item.title: 284: The Real Bling Ring | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Not to blame the victims here, but WHY DON'T CELEBRITIES LOCK THEIR DOORS? Anyway, meet Nick and Rachel, two bored, celebrity obsessed, high schoolers who decide it would be cool to break into the homes of celebrities like Paris Hilton, ORLANDO BLOOM, and Rachel Bilsion TO GO SHOPPING IN THEIR CLOSETS. They become self described "sexy bandits" as they steal from the rich and famous who, SOMEHOW, seem not to notice.

item.title: 283: Murder at the Burger Joint | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Four teenagers are kidnapped from their job at the local burger joint and then murdered in the woods. Decades later, we still don't know what happened. But with so many witnesses, how is that possible? LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 300 FULL BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW! Including our episode-by-episode coverage of "Trainwreck: Woodstock '99," "Bad Vegan" "LuLaRich" "John Wayne Gacy: Devil in Disguise"

item.title: 282: Operation Flagrant Foul | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description OHHHHHH BOY, WE'RE TALKING ABOUT THE SPORTSBALL AGAIN! All his life, Tim Donaghy wanted to be a referee in the NBA. Only 50 people get that job, and he was one of them. And there's only one cardinal rule for the job: no betting on anything. Ever. This...proved to be a problem for Tim who got mixed up with the Mafia and his own spectacular greed in a scheme that would ruin his life, devastate his family, and land him in prison.

item.title: 281: Serial Killer: The Murders Of Joel Rifkin | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On June 28, 1993, New York State Troopers notice a truck driving without a license plate. When they pull the driver over, they discover the body of Tiffany Bresciani under a tarp in the truck's bed. With Rifkin arrested, authorities quickly learn about his years of terrorizing and murdering women in and around New York City between 1989 and 1993. In all, he is believed to have murdered and dismembered at least 17 women.

item.title: 280: The McMartin Preschool Trial | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Imagine being charged with a horrendous crime that you did not commit? Then your whole family is publicly investigated for seven years. AND THEN you go to trial, which lasts another three years. This is what happened to the McMartin family of Manhattan Beach, California when a group of parents FALSELY claimed that their pre-school was run by devil worshiping pedophiles. It's one of the most shocking and terrifying stories of our time.

item.title: 279: The Happy Face Killer: Mind of A Monster | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On January 22, 1990, the body of 23 year old Tanuja Bennett is discovered in a wooded area known as the Columbia Gorge near Portland, Oregon. Soon a woman named Laverne Pavlinac would confess to helping her husband commit the brutal crime. But her story isn't adding up. Then, suddenly, a written confession on a bathroom stall door connects Tanjua's murder to a string of others and authorities quickly realize they have a serial killer on the loose.

item.title: 278: The Murder of Amy Mullis | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Hog farmer, Todd Mullis, claimed his wife fell on a four-pronged corn rake and died, but when investigators found more than four holes in Amy Mullis’ body, they knew her death was no accident. And their 13-year-old son may hold the key details to what really happened to his mother. FAMMMM!! OBSESSED FEST '23 TICKETS ARE NOW ON SALE!! Obsessed Fest '23 is happening in Dallas, TX From October 20 - 22nd.

item.title: 277: 'Twas The Fight Before Christmas | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description THIS. EPISODE. IS. WILD. Meet Jeremy Morris, or "Mr. Christmas" as he calls himself. He LOVES to decorate his house for the holidays. And he loves to make it the biggest and brightest spectacle this side of the north pole. But when he moves to a new neighborhood and his new neighbors don't love the idea of THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE and BUSLOADS OF TOURISTS coming through for weeks at a time, Jeremy decides to terrorize the neighborhood with armed guards and lawsuits.

item.title: 276: The Murder of The Farmer's Wife | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description When Shirley Carter was found murdered in her farmhouse kitchen, her husband Bill was considered a prime suspect. But the husband pointed the finger at someone else--his son Jason. Jason said he had an alibi, but how strong was it? FAMMMM!! OBSESSED FEST '23 TICKETS ARE NOW ON SALE!! Obsessed Fest '23 is happening in Dallas, TX From October 20 - 22nd. Come and hang out with your favorite true crime podcasters and personalities from docs we've covered!

item.title: 275: The Most Hated Man On The Internet: Part 2 | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Don't worry, this one ends with ANONYMOUS RUINING THIS GUY'S LIFE. Anyway...In 2010, a 24 year old man named Hunter Moore launched the website IsAnyoneUp.com. The site was built to allow people to anonymously post nude photos of other people and connect those photos to the person's social media profiles and, in many cases, home addresses. It was the birth of what "Revenge Porn." But Moore, went one step further, HACKING INTO PEOPLE'S EMAILS to steal their nude photos and then posting them on the site without the subject's knowledge or consent.

item.title: 274: Cheerleader On Trial | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description High school senior Skylar Richardson told no one of her pregnancy. But when a newborn's body was found buried in the family's backyard, Skylar was charged with murder. FAMMMM!! OBSESSED FEST '23 TICKETS ARE NOW ON SALE!! Obsessed Fest '23 is happening in Dallas, TX From October 20 - 22nd. Come and hang out with your favorite true crime podcasters and personalities from docs we've covered! There will be panels, meetups, meet & greets, book signings, Gillian's Taylor Swift Singalong, Karaoke, games, AND WE'RE CLOSING OUT THE WEEKEND WITH A HUGE EPIC DRAG BRUNCH!

item.title: 273: The Most Hated Man on the Internet | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In 2010, a 24 year old man named Hunter Moore launched the website IsAnyoneUp.com. The site was built to allow people to anonymously post nude photos of other people and connect those photos to the person's social media profiles and, in many cases, home addresses. It was the birth of what "Revenge Porn." But Moore, went one step further, HACKING INTO PEOPLE'S EMAILS to steal their nude photos and then posting them on the site without the subject's knowledge or consent.

item.title: OBSESSED FEST '23 TICKETS NOW AVAILALBE! | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description FAAAAAMMMM!!! Tickets for Obsessed Fest '23 are now live!! Join us in Dallas from October 20 - 22! Come mix and mingle with your favorite true crime podcast hosts (seriously, we're just walking around or drinking at the bar! Grab us for hugs and pictures anytime!) and check out one of a kind panels, meetups, meet & greets, book signings, GILLIAN'S TAYLOR SWIFT SINGALONG, Karaoke, games and more! PLUS SEE TRUE CRIME OBSESSED AND OBSESSED WITH DISAPPEARED LIVE SHOWS IN THE SAME WEEKEND!

item.title: 272: Murder At The Mall | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In the early hours of December 20, 1979, the body of 18-year-old Michelle Martinko was found in her car in the parking lot of a mall in Cedar Rapids, Iowa. She was stabbed multiple times. The murder baffled investigators for several decades. In this episode, we explore the unrelenting quest to solve one of Iowa's most haunting cases and how Michelle Martinko herself may have helped solve her own murder.

item.title: 271: No Good Deed: A Crowdfunding Holiday Heist | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description THIS IS WHY WE CAN'T HAVE NICE THINGS! In 2017, just before the holidays, Mark D'Amico and Kate McClure started a Gofundme for veteran named Johnny who was living on the streets of Philadelphia. The campaign won the hearts--and donations--of over 14,000 people and raised nearly $400,000. But when investigators took a closer look, all was not what it seemed. FAM!! OBSESSED FEST IS BACK! Book your hotel stay here right now if you want to stay where all the action is!

item.title: 270: Killing Momma | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On June 14, 2015, Sheriff's deputies found the body of Dee Dee Blanchard facedown in her bedroom in the home she shared with her daughter Gypsy Rose Blanchard. And Gypsy, who uses a wheel chair, is missing. And in a terrifyingly cryptic Facebook post, someone on the internet is taking credit for the crime. What is going on here? And where is Gypsy? OBSESSED FEST IS BACK! Obsessed Fest 2023 will take place in Dallas from October 20 - 22nd!

item.title: 269: Nail Bomber: Manhunt | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Over the course of three weekends in 1999, homemade nail bombs were detonated in three London neighborhoods. Each bomb contained 1500 four-inch nails, loaded for maximum human destruction. Three people were killed and 140 more were maimed. Would the London police be able to find this madman before he strikes again? OBSESSED FEST IS BACK! Obsessed Fest 2023 will take place in Dallas from October 20 - 22nd! Tickets go on sale on Friday, December 3rd, BUT YOU CAN BOOK YOUR HOTEL ROOM NOW!

item.title: 268: Murder In A Wisconsin Field | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description When a beautiful young teacher was found shot to death in a Wisconsin farm field, police quickly arrested her live-in boyfriend who had waited 18 hours to report her missing. But did he do it? And if he didn't, who else would have a motive to kill her? COME TO PATRICK'S TRAVELING BOOK PARTY!! It's like nothing we've ever done before! It's one part dance party / on part reading from his hilarious book / one part hang sesh!

item.title: 267: Rich & Shameless: Girls Gone Wild | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Remember "Girls Gone Wild"? If you're a kid of the 90s or early 00s, the TV ads were practically a staple of your childhood. But it probably won't shock you to know that there's a dark backstory. Enter Joe Francis, the man behind the empire. He conned young women and girls into participating far more sinister than "harmless flashing on the beach." And now, Joe Francis is a man on the run.

item.title: 266: Murder on the Gulf Coast | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description When the body of former policewoman Taylor Wright was discovered on a remote Pensacola farm, detectives had a lineup of suspects to investigate - her ex- husband from whom Taylor stole $100,000, her new girlfriend Casandra, and Taylor's new best friend, Ashley. But which one of them did it? And Why? FAM!! THE FULL VIDEO OF OUR LIVE SHOW FILMED AT OBSESSED FEST IS NOW LIVE ON PATREON! The Broadway Dancers!

item.title: 265: The Martha Mitchell Effect | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description LET THE WOMEN DO THE WORK. Martha Mitchell was one of the most outspoken women in Washington. And when she learned of the biggest crime ever committed by a sitting American President, the administration knew she needed to be "handled". But try as they did to restrain, drug, and ruin her, Martha Mitchell could not be silenced. Just another BADASS WOMAN who is not taking any S**T! FAM!! THE FULL VIDEO OF OUR LIVE SHOW FILMED AT OBSESSED FEST IS NOW LIVE ON PATREON!

item.title: 264: Murder in the Kentucky Hills | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Shayna Hubers called 911 to report she had killed her boyfriend in self-defense after he attacked her. But investigators soon learned he was planning a date with a beauty queen the night he died. Did Shayna kill him in a jealous rage? FAM!! THE FULL VIDEO OF OUR LIVE SHOW FILMED AT OBSESSED FEST IS NOW LIVE ON PATREON! The Broadway Dancers! The Obsessed Fest crowd! The Energy! The laughs!

item.title: 263: The Perfect Bid: The Contestant Who Knew Too Much | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description The is one of our funniest episodes in a minute! Fam, get ready to meet Ted Slauson, a math teacher who becomes OBSESSED with the gameshow The Price is Right. He spends weeks and months MEMORIZING THE COST OF THOUSANDS OF ITEMS in order to beat the game--a tactic which is apparently perfectly legal. He goes to the show over and over hoping to make it on and helps so many gameshow hopefuls beat the game along the way.

item.title: 262: Murder Under The Blue Moon: The Smith Family Massacre | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On July 31, 2015, the bodies of Voncile Smith and two of her adult sons were found in her Pensacola home. They had been brutally murdered days before. The crime was up close and personal, indicating that the murders had been committed by someone who knew the victims. But who would do such a thing? And why? FAM!! THE FULL VIDEO OF OUR LIVE SHOW FILMED AT OBSESSED FEST IS NOW LIVE ON PATREON!

item.title: 261: Scream: The True Story (aka The Murders of The Gainesville Ripper) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description "Scream" is everyone's favorite scary movie, but did you know it's based on a true story? It's inspired by the life and murders of Danny Rolling, aka "The Gainesville Ripper". Rolling admits to killing at least 8 people during his reign of terror in the early 90s, but he claims that the devil made him do it. Could that be true? This film aims to find out. FAM!! THE FULL VIDEO OF OUR LIVE SHOW FILMED AT OBSESSED FEST IS NOW LIVE ON PATREON!

item.title: 260: The Doctor is Dead: The Murder of Teresa Sievers | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On June 28, 2015, Teresa Sievers, a popular doctor and mother of two young children, was found murdered in her Florida kitchen. The house wasn't ransacked and nothing was stolen, so it looked like a murder-for-hire. But who would want her dead? And why? When two suspects are arrested, they have a story to tell, and the twists and turns this story takes will shock you. FAM!! THE FULL VIDEO OF OUR LIVE SHOW FILMED AT OBSESSED FEST IS NOW LIVE ON PATREON!

item.title: 259: The Lizzie Borden Murders | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description The Borden murders are the most infamous double murders in American History, but there's more to the story than you've been told. On the morning of August 4, 1892, Lizzy's step mother, Abby, was bludgeoned to death in an upstairs bedroom of the family home. A few hours later, Lizzie's father, Andrew, met the same fate on the couch in the downstairs family room. Lizzie and the maid were the only other people home.

item.title: Bad Vegan | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Sarma Melngailis is a beautiful and successful restauranter in New York City. Her raw vegan restaurant attracts celebrities and influencers and owning the place is the culmination of all of her dreams coming true. Then a man named Shane Fox enters her life. He's secretive and quietly controlling. But he promises her that he can make her beloved dog immortal and can protect her from outside forces looking to do her harm.

item.title: 258: The Curse of the Von Dutch: Part 2 | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description As the Von Dutch brand climbs to the pinnacle of trendy fashion, behind the scenes, things are getting messy. And a murder by one of the brand's founders threatens to bring down the whole empire. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 300 FULL BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW! Including our episode-by-episode coverage of "Bad Vegan" "LuLaRich" "John Wayne Gacy: Devil in Disguise" "

item.title: 257: The Curse of the Von Dutch | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Ahhh, the glory days of the early 2000s. Britney Spears was on the radio (remember THE RADIO?), "Friends" was in its glory days, and everyone was talking about "MY BIG FAT GREEK WEDDING???" But guess what? WE WERE ALSO ALL COVETTING THOSE VON DUTCH TRUCKER HATS! Von Dutch was THE brand that all the celebrities were wearing and everyone HAD to have. So it won't surprise you to find out that the entire brand was built on lies, double crosses, and murder.

item.title: 256: Murder In Ypsilanti: Keith Morrison Investigates | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In 2018, a reporter in Ypsilanti, Michigan received a mysterious anonymous email: a woman named Martha Agnu was dead. When the reporter looked into the death, another woman's name kept popping up: Tammy NIver. Tamny had been missing since 1993, and it seemed that Tammy and Martha had known each other. So what was going on here? How were these two women connected? And why had this town kept this connection a secret for 25 years?

item.title: 255: Selena: The Murder of an Icon (From Reel Crime Story) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description By age 23, Selena was an international icon. She'd won Grammys, was selling out stadiums, and recording chart topping albums in English and Spanish. Then on March 31, 1995, she was gunned down by her biggest fan and closest confidant. But why? What made her do it? And would it be possible to bring her to justice? COME TO OBSESSED FEST!! But only if you want to see ALL YOUR FAVORITE TRUE CRIME PODCASTERS IN THE SAME PLCE FOR A WHOLE WEEKEND!

item.title: 254: The Mysterious Death of Casey Kasem | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Casey Kasem was one of the most famous people in America--the voice of a generation. His death in 2014 shrouded in mystery. His wife says his children murdered him, his children blame her--their step mother. One side isn't telling the truth and as the story of this icon's final days unravel, you won't believe what you are hearing. COME TO OBSESSED FEST!! But only if you want to see ALL YOUR FAVORITE TRUE CRIME PODCASTERS IN THE SAME PLCE FOR A WHOLE WEEKEND!

item.title: 253: White Hot: The Rise and Fall of Abercrombie & Fitch | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Were you cool enough to wear Abercrombie? Did you wait in line to be granted the opportunity to walk past a shirtless teenaged model into a store with too-loud music and over priced cargo shorts? I KNOW YOU DID BECAUSE WE DID TOO! This doc is one part nostalgia and one part expose about how one of the world's most famous brand thrived on exclusion. COME TO OBSESSED FEST!

item.title: 252: The Green River Killer: Mind of a Monster | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In the 1980s and 90s, a monster known as The Green River Killer stalked the people of the Pacific northwest. He had one goal in mind: to be the most prolific serial killer of all time. LIKE HONESTLY WHAT MORE IS THERE TO SAY? After nearly two decades on the loose, when he's caught, he is convicted of killing 49 women and girls, though it is widely believed he killed upwards of 70.

item.title: 251: Erin Brockovich: The Real Rebel | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description THEY'RE CALLED BOOBS ED! This week we're getting the real story behind the Oscar winning smash hit film "Erin Brockovich". Erin herself is here to walk us though it and she's bringing all the LET THE WOMEN DO THE WORK energy with her! She's fighting for clean water and looking good doing it--WHICH WE KNOW DOESN'T MATTER, BUT WE LOVE HER SO JUST GO WITH IT. Anyway, this is one of our funniest (yup, that's a word) episodes in a minute SO CHECK IT OUT!

item.title: 250: Dirty Tricks | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Lotan Fisher is the best bridge player in the world. Yes, the card game bridge. BUT THIS GUY IS REALLY GOOD. He's making $500K PER YEAR, hanging out with BRIDGE LOVING CELEBRITIES (bridge-lebrities!). EVERYTHING'S COMING UP LOTAN. But then he's caught cheating. And the bridge world is rocked to it's core..TO IT'S CORE! But is he cheating, or is he just that good? LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 300 FULL BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW!

item.title: 249: The Hunt for the Chicago Strangler: Part 2 | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Citizen detectives make the shocking discovery that there may be as many as THREE ACTIVE SERIAL KILLERS on the loose in Chicago. As women continue to die, a killer in a neighboring state sheds some light on how the Chicago killings are being carried out--and how the killers are getting away with it. PATRICK IS HITTING THE ROAD WITH SUPER HOT HUSBAND STEVE! We're covering "Class Action Park" and we're coming to Minneapolis, Dallas, and Houston NEXT WEEK!

item.title: 248: The Hunt for the Chicago Strangler | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In Chicago, a serial killer is on the loose. Right now. As you're reading this. And nobody seems able to stop him. He has left dozes of dead women in his wake and nobody knows who will be next or when he will strike again. Who is this killer? And what will it take to end his reign of anonymous terror? This is one part of our two-part coverage.

item.title: 247: Truth And Lies: Monica & Bill | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description He was the most powerful man in the world. She was 22 year old intern who caught his eye. It was the scandal threatened to ruin them both and to drag the country down with them. AND. OH. MY. GOD. LINDA TRIPP. GOT. IT. ALL. ON. TAPE. PATRICK IS HITTING THE ROAD WITH MAGGIE, AND LANCE & TIM TO DO THE LIVE SHOW COVERING "THE DISAPPEARANCE OF MAURA MURRAY.

item.title: 246: Murder: The Last Days of Phil Hartman | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description When Saturday Night Live star Phil Hartman was murdered by his wife, who then took her own life, the world was shocked. The couple seemed to have it all--fame, money, two beautiful kids. So what could have caused have caused Hartman's wife, Brynn, to end it all. Also, this murder / suicide did not go down the way you think it did. PATRICK AND GILLIAN ARE BRING TCO LIVE TO LONDON!

item.title: 245: Trust No One: The Hunt For The Crypto King | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description 30 year old Gerald Cotton is dead. Or is he? As the young founder of a a company that trades Bitcoin, he had $136 Million of investor's money when he "died." And now the money is nowhere to be found. And nobody saw the body. Is Gerald actually dead, or is he on the run? PATRICK AND GILLIAN ARE BRING TCO LIVE TO LONDON! Come see us Friday, July 22 at Cadogan Hall.

item.title: Wild Crime | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Harold Henthorn had two wives, 18 years apart. Both women died mysteriously and both times, Harold was the only witness. ALSO each death resulted in massive insurance payouts for Harold. Harold's second wife, Toni, died in a national park. Harold says they had been on a hike, stopped at a scenic overlook, and she fell. But did he push her? When investigators dive into this case, nobody is prepared for what they would find.

item.title: Let The Women: Amanda Villegas on Getting Free | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Amanda was a single mother –struggling financially and working tirelessly– when she came home one day in 2011 with her daughter and turned on the news. A movement had been building in her town of El Paso, Texas around the wrongful conviction of Daniel Villegas. So, she wrote him a letter, turned her life upside down and made history. Here’s how one woman fought for someone else and found herself in the process.

item.title: 244: The Housewife & The Shah Shocker | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Real Housewife of Salt Lake City breakout star Jenn Shah is a lot of things: Beautiful, stylish, slightly unhinged, rich--OK, that last one maybe not. Nobody knows where Shah's money comes from. How does she afford her beautiful homes, her Porsche, the private jets, her $80,000 parties? When she's charged with running a telemarketing scam that targets the elderly, everything you thought you knew about her fabulous life is called into question.

item.title: Let The Women: Maggie Freleng on Murder in Alliance | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Maggie Freleng is one badass journalist. As a Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter and producer, she gravitates toward telling the stories of underdogs – specifically the wrongfully convicted. So, when she heard about the 1999 murder of Yvonne Lane – a young mother from a the small town of Alliance, Ohio – and her ex-boyfriend who was blamed for the crime but had maintained his innocence for over a decade, Maggie started digging.

item.title: 243: Anna Delvey: The SinFluencer of SoHo | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In 2013, 21 year old Anna Delvey arrived in New York City. She became a fixture at the trendiest nightclubs, she lived at the fanciest hotels. She was believed to be a German heiress worth over $60 million. But it was all a lie. She racked up bills all over town and destroyed lives in the process. But how was she able to scam so many people for so long?

item.title: Let The Women: Alexandria Goddard on Dismantling Rape Culture | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description August 11th, 2012 was a murky night for many in the town of Steubenville, Ohio as local high school students scattered themselves among a handful of parties that took a turn for the worse. A 16-yr-old girl – who would come to be known as Jane Doe – was repeatedly sexually assaulted at the hands of football players and bystanders alike, and it would take an outsider to follow the digital footprints and piece together that night as well as the wider web of rape culture in the town’s social hierarchy.

item.title: 242: The Last Call Killer | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In the early 1990s, fear and rumor swirled through New York’s LGBTQ community about a serial killer who targeted inebriated men leaving the city’s gay bars late at night. Their bodies, or rather body parts, were found wrapped in garbage bags and dumped at highway rest stops, far from the urban environs where they were last seen. Dubbed “The Last Call Killer,” it would take authorities almost an entire decade to stop him.

item.title: The Staircase | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On the evening of December 9, 2001, 48-year-old Kathleen Peterson died on a back staircase in her North Carolina home. Her husband Michael claims that she fell while he was out by the pool, but other evidence would point to Michael as Kathleen's murderer. Fam! You can hear our episode-by-episode coverage of all 13 episodes of "The Staircase" right now and ad free on our Patreon! On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 300 FULL BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW!

item.title: Let The Women: Lise Lotte-Lublin on Confronting Bill Cosby | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Lise Lotte-Lublin didn’t recall being sexually assaulted until 20 years after the fact while watching an interview with a famous model whose story seemed familiar. When she went to authorities only to learn nothing could be done, she decided to take the law into her own hands. She went on to change three sex crimes laws in her home state of Nevada, including the statute of limitations. She helped fellow survivors in other states do the same.

item.title: 241: The Lost Leonardo | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In 2005 a painting appeared in a gallery in New Orleans. it was believed to be from the 1500s and painted by a student of Leonardo Da Vinci. It was purchased for a little over $1,000. Within 5 years, this painting would be deemed a TRUE lost work of Leonardo Da Vinci--painted by the master himself--and sold for $400 Million. Is it possible that this painting had gone missing for hundreds of years and resurfaced in America?

item.title: Let The Women: Roberta Blevins on Living & Leaving LulaRoe | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description When Roberta Blevins casually bought a pair of buttery soft, printed leggings from a fellow young mom on Facebook, she never could have imagined the journey that would follow. The rise and fall of LulaRoe –a multi-level marketing company that denies allegations of being a pyramid scheme and still exists today– coincided with Roberta’s experience, carrying her up the Lula-ranks and back down again when she discovered the dark side of direct sales.

item.title: 240: Vanished in New Canaan: The Murder of Jennifer Dulos | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Jennifer Dulos seems to have a picture perfect life in affluent New Canaan, Connecticut. So when she fails to pick her kids up from school one afternoon, her friends and family know something is terribly wrong. And as the police investigation digs into her life, it becomes clear that Jennifer had been in danger for a long time. HERE ARE OUR ADDED TOUR DATES!!--PATRICK IS HITTING THE ROAD WITH MAGGIE, AND LANCE & TIM TO DO THE LIVE SHOW COVERING "

item.title: Let The Women: Anna Vasquez on the San Antonio Four | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description In the late ‘90s, Anna Vasquez, Cassandra Rivera, Elizabeth Ramirez, and Kristie Mayhugh all received phone calls accusing their lesbian friend group of a crime that never actually happened. What followed was a modern-day witch trial, landing the San Antonio Four –as they’d come to be called– in prison for over a decade. When Anna unexpectedly got out on parole ahead of the others, she had no choice but to lead the fight for their innocence.

item.title: The Delphi Murders | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On February 14, 2017, the bodies of 14 year old Abigail Williams and 13 year old Liberty German were found near the Manon High Bridge trail in Delphi, Indiana. The girls had disappeared from the trail the day before. Soon it was revealed that one of the girls, Libby, had captured audio and video of their presumed killer on her smart phone. But even with a mountain of evidence including audio of the killer's voice and a composite sketch, the girls' murder remains at large.

item.title: Let The Women: Gemma Hoskins on the Murder of Sister Cathy Cesnik | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Gemma Hoskins remembers high school fondly, thanks in large part to her favorite teacher Sister Cathy Cesnik. So, when the beloved nun disappeared one November night in 1969 only to eventually be discovered dead in the woods, grief took hold over this ambiguous story for decades. And then, truth-telling around abuse in those hallowed halls merged with Gemma’s outstanding questions. 40 years after the murder, she got to work with the help of a former classmate of hers, and together they’d uncover more about the past than anyone expected.

item.title: 239: Pharma Bro | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Martin Shkreli IS THE FREAKING WORST! The 38-year-old financial entrepreneur and pharmaceutical tycoon from Brooklyn was dubbed "the most hated man in America" in 2015 for price gouging the prescription drug Daraprim by 5500% overnight depriving AIDS patients, people with cancer, and pregnant people of the life-saving medication. That same year, Shkreli purchased the Wu-Tang Clan's single copy of "Once Upon a Time in Shaolin" for 2 million dollars, AND THEN TALKED TRASH ABOUT WU -TANG EVERY CHANCE HE GOT.

item.title: Let The Women: Rabia Chaudry on the Case Against Adnan Syed | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Long before the hit podcast Serial spurred the world into podcast-listening, Rabia Chaudry was on a mission. The 1999 murder of a high school student named Hae Min Lee left a community grieving and a family friend of Rabia’s, 17-year-old Adnan Syed, in the crosshairs. He was sentenced to life in prison, where he still is to this day. In this episode, we’ll trace Rabia’s decades-long fight to free Adnan, find Hae’s killer and champion the truths of so many others along the way.

item.title: 238: Tinder Swindler: Part 2 | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description It's late. You've had a glass of wine. You're young and hopeful and looking for love. So you start swiping through Tinder. You come across Simon Leviev, and you pause. He's handsome enough, seems like he has a full life, and he is RICH RICH RICH. You think, 'what the hell' and you swipe right. And wouldn't you know it, it's a match! Within minutes, he's messaging you asking to meet him for coffee.

item.title: Let The Women: Connie Walker on Missing & Murdered Indigenous Women | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Connie Walker is a journalist on a mission to tell the stories of missing & murdered indigenous women in Canada. So, when a band of fellow Cree siblings reached out to her asking if she’d find out what happened to their long-lost sister, Connie went searching. And the resulting journey of producing the podcast Missing & Murdered: Finding Cleo would prove to be about so much more than one family’s fate.

item.title: 237: Tinder Swindler | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description It's late. You've had a glass of wine. You're young and hopeful and looking for love. So you start swiping through Tinder. You come across Simon Leviev, and you pause. He's handsome enough, seems like he has a full life, and he is RICH RICH RICH. You think, 'what the hell' and you swipe right. And wouldn't you know it, it's a match! Within minutes, he's messaging you asking to meet him for coffee.

item.title: Let The Women: Lorri Davis on The West Memphis Three | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description One rainy New York night in 1996, Lorri Davis went to see a movie. It was a documentary about the murder of three cub scouts found in the woods and the three outcasts who were blamed for the crime. From there, her life changed forever. Here’s the story of how a young landscape architect, fell in love and into the fight to free the West Memphis Three. This episode is part of a ten-part series called Let The Women Do The Work.

item.title: 236: Memories of A Murderer: The Nilsen Tapes | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On a cold day in 1983, a plumber was called to an apartment building in the Cranley Gardens neighborhood of North London. The building drains were clogged. And when he climbed down into plumbing "man hole" he saw what was causing the blockage: human flesh and bone. What followed was essentially an elaborate confession by one of the building's tenants: Dennis Nilsen who explained to the police that he had murdered and dismembered at least 12 men and boys and disposed of them both UNDER HIS FLOORBOARDS AND DOWN THE DRAINS.

item.title: Introducing: Let The Women Do The Work with Gillian Pensavalle | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description This show has a bone to pick true crime podcasts. Where are all the women’s perspectives? The detectives, the witnesses, the movers and shakers of any case are not always dudes. So let’s widen our framework, shall we? On Let The Women Do The Work, join host Gillian Pensavalle as she follows the stories of ten dynamic, inspiring, badass women in true crime, one episode at a time.

item.title: The Curse of the Chippendales | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description LET'S OBJECTIFY SOME MEN FOR A CHANGE! The Chippendale all-male review (read STRIP SHOW) was the hottest shows in Los Angeles in the early 1980s. And it was all fun and games UNTILL THE MURDERS STARTED HAPPENING. First a Playboy playmate who frequented the club where the men stripped is killed. And then someone much closer to the show is murdered in his office in the middle of the day.

item.title: 235: Murdered and Missing in Montana | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Three young women vanish months apart from each other. Massive searches ensue for each. Days or weeks later, each one is found dead in the location they were last seen. In each case, their deaths are ruled hypothermia even though there's evidence of foul play. How could they have been missed by searchers? Were they abducted, murdered, and then brought back to the place they vanished? Loni Coombs investigates.

item.title: 234: The Murder of Gabby Petito: Truth, Lies, and Social Media | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On July 2, 2021, 22-year-old Gabby Petito and her fiance, 23-year-old Briann Laundrie took off on the adventure of a lifetime. Driving cross country on a "vanlife" adventure that Gabby shared with the world via her instagram account. By late August, Gabby stopped communicating with her family. And then on September 2, Brian returned home without Gabby. AND HE REFUSED TO SPEAK WITH AUTHORITIES OR HELP IN THE SEARH EVEN AFTER GABBY WAS REPORTED MISSING.

item.title: What Lurks Inside The Walls: Hidden Rooms (From Strange & Unexplained) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description FAM!! Season 2 of the Obsessed Network Original Podcast "Strange & Unexplained With Daisy Eagan" launches today! In case you aren't familiar, “Strange & Unexplained is a podcast about all the things that make us wonder. Each week host Daisy Eagan tells the tale of something strange–sometimes it’s paranormal like a haunting or alien encounter, other times it Earthly like an unexplained disappearance or an unsolved murder. But it’s always a twisted tale of something just beyond what we can easily understand.

item.title: 233: The Murdaugh Murders | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On the evening of June 7, 2021, Alex Murdaugh, a member of one of the most powerful families in South Carolina, came home to a brutal scene: The bodies of his 21 year old son, Paul, and 52 year old wife, Maggie. Both of whom had been shot multiple times. Could this be connected to the death of Paul's friend Mallory, who had been thrown from a boat Paul had been driving while drunk?

item.title: 232: The Abduction and Murder of Kristin Smart (From Dateline) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On May 25, 1996, 19-year-old college student Kristin Smart went to an off-campus party. Around 2 am, she was last seen being helped back to her dorm by another student named Paul Flores. No one ever saw Kristin again. It would take over 25 years to unravel the mystery of what happened that night and to be able to prove what happened to Kristin Smart. COME SEE US ON TOUR!

item.title: 231: Keep Sweet (The Cult of the FLDS and Warren Jeffs) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description DON’T WORRY, YOU ONLY HAVE TO HEAR WARREN JEFFS SING ONCE. Look, tick tock, it’s cult o’clock. We’re back with the FLDS (the culty fundementialist sect of the Mormon faith) and it’s ten years after that piece of s**t pedophile Warren Jeffs went to prison FOR LIFE. The devoted followers he left behind are suffering and trying to pick up the pieces of their broken lives, all while trying to keep their faith.

item.title: 230: Adrienne (The Murder of Adrienne Shelly) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Adrienne Shelly was a writer and actress best known for writing and co-starring the film Waitress, which was later turned into a Broadway musical. But on the evening of November 1st, 2006 she was fond dead--hanging in the bathroom of her West Village, NYC office. The initial assumption by investigators was suicide, but her husband Andy didn't believe it and pushed the cops to work the case like a murder.

item.title: 229: BEANIE MANIA! | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description THERE'S NO MURDER! NOBODY DIES! AND A BUNCH OF RICH CHARDONNAY (PROBABLY, RIGHT?) CHUGGING CUL-DE-SAC MOMS LOSE A BUNCH OF MONEY. THIS CAN ONLY MEAN ONE THING: IT'S TIME TO TALK ABOUT BEANIE MANIA! Also, we beg you, please don't throw your kids OUT OF THE CAR onto A FIVE LANE HIGHWAY when a DELIVERY TRUCK OVERTURNS just to snag a handful of McDonalds-bound Teenie Beanies. Just please don't.

item.title: 228: Times Square Killer: Part 2 | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description A madman is on the loose. The press is calling him The Torso Killer because of the gruesome headless and handless bodies he leaves behind. And while investigators search for him in New York City, similar murders are discovered across the river in New Jersey. After one woman narrowly escapes, a suspect is identified. Now they have to find him before he kills again. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 200 FULL BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW!

item.title: TCO IS GOING ON TOUR! | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description FAM!!! We're hitting the road with a brand new show covering the TCO classic "Class Action Park"!!! The Patreon pre-sale is on right now! Tickets go on sale for everyone tomorrow! If you're on the Patreon, check your email, you have all the links and codes you need! If you're NOT on the Patreon and you want to get in on this presale, GO HERE TO JOIN PATREON RIGHT NOW AND YOU'LL GET INSTANT ACCESS!

item.title: 227: The Times Square Killer (Part 1) | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description FAM! THIS IS A TWO-PARTER! Part 2 is available RIGHT NOW AND AD-FREE at the $5 level on Patreon as a special bonus. Part 2 will be our regular episode next. Times Square, 1979: fire fighters and police are called to a low budget motel where a room is on fire. What they find is "the motel room from hell"--where two headless and handless torsos have been set ablaze.

item.title: 226: Butcher Baker | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Between 1971 and 1983, meek and mild Robert Hansen seemed to have it all; a loving wife and children, a successful bakery business, and world-record hunting trophies bringing him respect from his peers. But behind this carefully cultivated exterior lurked a cold-blooded serial murderer who confessed to killing 21 women, 17 of which were recovered. It was only due to the actions of a few dedicated Anchorage, Alaska detectives (one of whom is the literal embodiment of LET THE WOMEN DO THE WORK!

item.title: 225: Taken: The Real Life "Gone Girl" | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description 6 years ago, Aaron Quinn and Denise Huskins were woken in the middle of the night. It was a male voice who said, "wake up, this is a robbery." They were both drugged and bound, and Denise was kidnapped and heled for 48 hours before being released. The ordeal was horrific, but even more terrifying: Nobody believed them. The cops insisted the whole thing was a hoax, even as the kidnapper made it clear that he was still out there, and could come back at any time.

item.title: 224: The Murder of Jessica Chambers: An ID Mystery | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On December 6, 2014, 19-year-old Jessica Chambers was set on fire and left for dead. Her injuries were horrific and she died a few hours later. Who would do this to the popular young woman, and why? Investigators had few clues to go as the dogged search for Jessica's killer takes over her small town. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 200 FULL BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW!

item.title: 223: Murder By The Coast | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description On October 9, 1999, 18-year-old Rocio Wanninkohf was brutally murdered. Her mother's ex-girlfriend was immediately charged for the murder and convicted. But did she do it? Three years later, another young woman is murdered just steps from her front door. And when the two cases are connected, investigators realize they have a serial killer on the loose. LOOKING FOR MORE TCO? On our Patreon feed, you'll find over 200 FULL BONUS episodes to BINGE RIGHT NOW!

item.title: LuLaRich | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description THREE WORDS: DEAD. FART. LEGGINGS. Meet Mark and DeAnne, the founders of LuLaRoe - the legging company that went from explosive startup to four-alarm corporate wildfire. They share their life stories up to the founding of LuLaRoe. Seeing dollar signs, DeAnne grows her business from one woman selling dresses to a massive network of saleswomen. The business takes off and the future looks bright. Maybe a little too bright.

item.title: 222: While He Was Sleeping | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description Scott and Yarmila Falater had it all. A beautiful marriage, 2 kids who adored them: the perfect upper middle class existence. But then, on January 16, 1997, Scott brutally murdered Yarmila while their children slept. He stabbed her 42 times before throwing her body into the family pool to make sure she was dead. He has never denied doing this. However, he says he's not responsible because he was sleepwalking.

item.title: 221: Unraveled: Stalker's Web | True Crime Obsessed
item.description: Podcast Description WILLIAM ELIZABETH AND ALEXIS ARE BAAAAAAAACK, and they are knock knock knocking on people's doors trying to figure some shit out. AND YOU ALL NEED TO PULL THE HELL OVER because this time they're unraveling the mystery of the world's most terrifying AND I'M GONNA SAY IT diabolical online stalker. The guy is STILL OUT THERE and is a total psychological terrorist who has turned the lives of dozens of people upside down.
